job.title: Delivery Boys in Bangalore
job.description: Delivery Executive (Responsibility) Handling of Cash/ Food Coupons/ Credit Card Should know to read & write English and speak local language. should have presentable looks should be polite & well mannered from service industry Physically fit - to carry and deliver crates/ other products Basic knowledge and usage of mobile APP Able to work in shift : First 6.00 AM to 2.00 PM Second 2.30 PM to 11.00 PM No 2 Wheeler required...
